item.title: rot90
item.author: vllbc
item.description: 正为逆时针转，负为顺时针转。 import numpy as np mat = np.array([[1,3,5], [2,4,6], [7,8,9] ]) print mat, "# orignal" mat90 = np.rot90(mat, 1) print mat90, "# rorate 90 <left> anti-clockwise" mat90 = np.rot90(mat, -1) print mat90, "# rorate 90 <right> clockwise" mat180 = np.rot90(mat, 2) print mat180, "# rorate 180 <left> anti-clockwise" mat270 = np.rot90(mat, 3) print mat270, "# rorate 270
